title: One Night with His Wife
description: Luc Sarrazin's marriage to Star had been hasty and brief. Star had disappeared, but Luc had never filed for divorce.Eighteen months later, Luc tracks Star down -- fearing she's involved in a fraud. When he discovers that Star is the mother of twins, he feels doubly deceived!Luc conceded he would have the fraud charge dropped if Star will spend just one last time in his bed. But he's not prepared for the cost of fleeting passion -- the morning after, he wants more...even to mend his marriage!
author: Lynne Graham
